definition: to dodge/to evade
surname Shan

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
to hide/to dodge/to avoid

sentences.english: Flinching is preparation for being hit.
sentences.chinese: 閃躲是對捱打所做的準備。

sentences.english: The only exposure that I'm sure does persist is radiation.
sentences.chinese: 我相信唯一我們不能閃躲的就只有輻射。

sentences.english: What am I to you, tell me darling ture.
sentences.chinese: 在你心中我是什麼顏色，告訴我親愛，不要閃躲。

sentences.english: He jumps back as several of the other heads lunge.
sentences.chinese: 當好幾個頭突然襲來時，他趕緊跳回閃躲。

sentences.english: The unconscious evinces knowledge that , for the most part, escapes the speaking being.
sentences.chinese: 無意識閃躲知識，大部份時間，還閃避說話的主體。

sentences.english: If you're hit, you don't flinch.
sentences.chinese: 如果你捱打的時候並不閃躲。

sentences.english: And when his father raises his hand, he flinches.
sentences.chinese: 他的父親舉起手臂，他就會閃躲。

sentences.english: See skulking Truth to her old cavern fled.

definition: dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
the moth flies into the flame/fatal attraction
lit. wading in mud and water/a slovenly job/sloppy
to harbor evil designs/to harbor malicious intentions
to deceive/to cheat
to shift one's eyes/(fig.) to shift one's attention/to divert attention
to keep silent
to bear grudges
lit. dumb as a wooden chicken (idiom); fig. dumbstruck
to pull a face/to grimace/to scowl
to disdain as beneath contempt (idiom)
see 直截了當|直截了当[zhi2 jie2 liao3 dang4]
to act shamelessly/to behave in a way that leaves others tut-tutting and shaking their heads in disapproval
indecisive/wavering
depressed/cheerless
lit. to hate iron for not becoming steel/to feel resentful towards sb for failing to meet expectations and impatient to see improvement (idiom)
